description: The tension comes after a six-week war killed thousands over the disputed territory in the Caucasus.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict flares despite ceasefire
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict flares despite ceasefire - BBC News
maintext: The region is recognised as part of Azerbaijan but has been run by ethnic Armenians since 1994 after the two countries fought a war over the territory which left thousands dead.
